config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
for input in "${@}"
do
  # If directory, skip to next loop iteration
  [[ -d "${input}" ]] && continue

  # If we reach here, at least one path is not a directory
  echo -n 'false'
  exit 1
done

# If we reach here, all paths are directories
echo -n 'true'
